message.body: Who has key to back padlock?? To backyard? (Sorry thanks!)
(Just wondering, nothing is wrong or anything)
Which padlock - the one into the driveway?
Oooh yes I guess? Didn't even realize it was a driveway
But yes backyard
Well kind of. To
Well kind of. Two cars fit back there but I don't want it used as a driveway anymore.
I'd rather people use it as nice space to hang. It is so much more open without cars back there.
Did you get a chance to discuss everything with Beth?
I was hoping she could suggest a plan of action on how to proceed from here.
I didn't have a chance to talk to her but I def will. I even bought an actual bed to lift mattress off floor, and now I have a cover
So I think just redoing it and rewashing I dunno
Since when she came and dusted, I didn't have a cover and I hadn't done all the 'steps' bc she said she didn't see anything
She didn't say there Weren't bed bugs, but just that she didn't see any obv
But this time I guess ill do the steps ? I guess we will see if kaushal has problems
I won't mention anything
So I'm not prejudicing it or scaring people
Removing the rug might be good and also I'll cover the vent?
:) how is Hawaii
￼Lol but yeah it's hard to see in photo but it's like four bites in a row right around my middle too
And I have a row on each ankle
Shit. Tommy was there yesterday. I forgot to ask him to pull the carpet up & check it out. I'd ask Beth about the carpet & vent.
So weird bc For a few days it was fine!!!
For like a week totally fine!!
I'm thinking I left, they migrated,
And now they're like oooh hey what'sup Ingrid
Maybe they suckled on Alex or someone who doesn't have any reaction to them
And now they slowly Came back
Yeah. I hate those lil fuckers!!!
To my room to hang out w me bc I'm awesome/delicious
Hahaha. Also ask David. He had Cindy come back a few days ago but I thought he said she didn't find anything.
Cool. Just tell her you just want to see what her thoughts are.
No. He said he saw a bedbug.
Lol but yeah I'll call tomorrow sorry I was working
Why did Cindy come back? Just to check?
Is he getting bit too? I'd feel less crazy if someone else was showing bites
Yeah totes
Haha toooootally
He & Phillip got them like back in May. Beth came out & sprayed twice. The 2nd time she not only sprayed their rooms but yours & I think Alex & maybe Kaushals.
Lol like I'm totally getting bitten again but I feel nutso bc no one else is so I don't want to seem like the new paranoid Roomie lol
Hah k I'll call
This thing has cost me over $1,000 already. Plus I asked David pay a portion b/c he was likely the person to bring them in. Kinda got into the biggest argument we've ever had.
But aside from all of that BS Hawaii is super nice! Did you say you have been here?
Yeah. Well one
One of them.....
Yeah this is basically a landlord's nightmare aka money sinkhole
Lol whenever I am jealous of people who own homes and rent I think about situations like this and breathe sigh of relief lol
Nope! Never been
I just think bedbugs need the whole house to be part of the effort
So cleaning All stuff putting All mattresses in covers and dusting All rooms
But w 7 people that'll be really hard
Mostly since everyone suspects I'm nuts since they're not getting but
*bit
With work & everything I don't spend nearly enough time at the beach but I'm here now.
I mean they see my bites but they're like 'maybe your friend has bedbugs and you get them there!' Lol like no, I wake up w new bites
Omg jealous
From what Beth said you just never know. Sometimes it spreads like Wildfire & sometimes it stays contained.
￼I gallery sat and then took down artwork from last drop
Weird hmm..yeah well I hope we fix it bc it sucks getting bit alive and I bet it'll get worse In coming week
Bc this is what happened before..
This place has its Pros & Cons but the beaches & the mountains are pretty much amazing!!
I was getting a few bites a night
And then suddenly I was getting like 20
And on my face
And my bf got them all over his face and That's when I was like ok maybe I'll tell my landlord cuz this is weird
Lol but it took awhile
Bc I figured I just needed to vacuum lol
So much better than Philly
OK. Did Cindy say when she could come? I just ordered a vacuum. Another victim of this mess was that vacuum. It was barely a year old & it was left out in the rain???
Lol yeah I heard wtf
Nah I'll call her tomorrow
K night!
You just can't make this shit up.......
Come visit if you ever get a chance. It's far but it's worth it!!
Were you able to get in touch with Beth and /or Cindy?
Yeah! She said she spoke to David and is coming tomorrow at 8am to see his room so she'll come to me too
I'll try to have the bed built tonight so my mattress is finally off the floor too
￼Apologies for the very unattractive dude pic but yeah I got more last night lol
*nude pic
Notice the tan from the daily dog walking tho! Impressive eh!?
But yeah the bites...I woke up during the night for the first time last night from the new bites
￼Have me all over my Lower back in a row too
*have them

Man I really hate those guys!!! I suspect that what you had before wasn't spider bites but Bed bugs. Do you know if she treated for both last time? Or just for spiders? Did you get a chance to call Beth?
She treated for bed bugs too (powdered) and yes I agree :)
I think they shifted to another room bc I left for a week and so I was safe for a few days but now they're back and eating me
￼￼I have four in a row on outside left ankle and 1 on inside one
Hahahahahahaha
Liiiike I'll sleep at my dad's tonight
But yeah it's amazing that it's so hard to get rid of them
Maybe. From what I remember from a conversation with Beth is that they can migrate or just go into a hibernation.
And don't worry. I live in Hawaii. I'm used to seeing people running around with little or no clothing.
￼Actually it's like three in a row on the other side too i just didn't realize bc they're so close together
I mean they're literally in rows now so yesss
:( what a bummer
Lolol
Yeah I'm Romanian so me toooo
As much as I hate them & I really hate them - I'll have a modicum of respect for them. They are hard core little fuckers. They certainly are persistent.
Hahahaha yeah it's def impressive
It's like when I was hardcore played (lied to) by a man who had a live in gf the whole time!!! (Long story)
Buuuut I was annoyed but mainly just...in *awe* and weirdly admired the gall
Like damn, these bedbugs get what they WANT
You got a chance to talk to David?
Nope
That's horrible! You should have kicked his ass! Have you seen Orange is the new black?
Yeah as much as some people do despicable shit, you gotta sort of admire the chutzpah.....
Haven't mentioned my bites to anyone
Bc I feel like they think I'm nuts
Avery and Alex think it's a mistake lol and I don't have heart to tell them
Lol no I haven't and yeah it was horrible mainly bc she was calling me and he was telling me she stalked him and wasn't w him
But actually she was doing his laundry/cooking him meals and he said he'd have a baby w her lol
(I eventually answered her calls and asked her for drinks)
Hahaha. Sounds like a trailer for a Rom com I saw the other day.
Hahahahahahaha yeah I was horrified but also ...I weirdly look up to it
It's so unbelievably scummy but also , dude was a hella good liar
He took me to his company picnic and told me he doesn't hang out w his coworkers bc they cheat on their gfs and he NeVeR WOuLd TReAT WOmEN LiKe ThEy Do
Lolol like he didn't just lie, he over the top lied
Scummy people and scummy bugs are impressive bc they make life work for Them lol
Wow!!They say socio paths can be that way. Very likable. Very good at lying & basically have no conscience about it. It would eat up a normal person but they find a way to justify it.
That is pretty ballsy!
He's 100% a sociopath
He lied about Everything
His interests, his background
Everything
Lololol it's amazing
He told his gf he's all about family and wants a stay at home mom
He told me he was attracted to me bc I'm a feminists (LOL!!!) and independent
I listen to a lot of podcasts on NPR & listened to one about sociopaths. I think you'd appreciate it.
And of course, when I answered her calls and told her the truth, he immediately blocked me on every social media and told her I was Stalking him
Sometimes the bigger the lie the easier it is to believe.
LolololololololLOlOLOL
You wonder if the shit ever catches up with someone like that.
Lololol anyway these bed bugs remind me of that somehow
Lol nah I think they just use friends/partners/coworkers
I don't think it catches up to them
Lol he was insanely charming and I 100% believed him
Turns out his entire persona was just mostly lies
Liiiike he told me he hated the machismo of sports
Lol he loves sports according to his gf
He told me he wanted to go to making time and see glass candy w me
She said he hates dancing and dance parties
(Told me he loved dancing and invited me to go dancing)
Lololol anyway blood sucking parasites are totally amazing I agree
I'll look up the npr link pronto
Yeah. Man over the years I have come across some really shitty people. It can make you lose your faith in humanity. But then I remember those people are less then 10% of society.
Though they are probably responsible for 90% of the bullshit we deal with.
I suspect many of them go into politics.
Actually I just listened & I think I listened to a different podcast with the same author.
